SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_INTERACTION_GETCATEGORYID
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Find the categoryid based on the category name
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_INTERACTION_GETCATEGORYID ( @categoryID uniqueidentifier output, -- The category id found @categoryName nvarchar(100) = '', -- Category Name to search for (case insensitive) @raiseErrorIfNotFound bit = 1 -- When this is set to 1 an error is raised if the category cannot be found -- If this is 0, then a null categoryid is passed back through the output parm ) as begin declare @errorMsg nvarchar(255) = '' set @errorMsg = 'Couldn''t find Category=' + @categoryName
begin try set @categoryID = null
select @categoryID = ID from dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY where lower (NAME) = lower (@categoryName)
if @categoryID is null and @raiseErrorIfNotFound = 1 raiserror(@errorMsg,16,1);
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0 end
